What will happen to my work and love life if I am seduced by my boss...?\n\n*This work is a re-edited version of what was published in the magazines \"Renai LoveMAX\" and \"Renai Cherry Pink.\" If you have purchased the digital distribution version of the magazine \"Renai LoveMAX\" or \"Renai Cherry Pink\", please note that the content may overlap.","ja":"あなたの右腕になれるなら、どんな命令も従います…!! 異動先の上司は社長に「八面六臂(はちめんろっぴ)の頼れる男」と言わしめた人。7か国語を操り7人分の仕事をクールにスマートにこなす。でも8つ目の顔は会社の人間は誰も知らない。その上司の大事な右腕として昼は仕事のサポートを命じられ、そして夜には知られざる彼の8つ目の顔が現れて…!? 「さあ、俺と君がケダモノになる時間だ」 「まずは君を覚醒させてあげる」 仕事と生活を充実させるのがワークライフバランス。でも私の上司が大事にしてるのはワークセックスバランス!! 仕事とセックスの充実――…!? その上司に誘惑されて、私の仕事と恋はどうなっちゃうの…?\n\n※この作品は雑誌「恋愛LoveMAX」「恋愛チェリーピンク」に掲載されたものを再編集したものです。デジタル配信版の雑誌「恋愛LoveMAX」「恋愛チェリーピンク」をお求めになった方は、コンテンツ内容が重複する場合がございますので、ご注意ください。"},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B01LZJL124","ap":"8-tsu-no-kao-wo-motsu-joushi","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/403437/","mu":"121667"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"josei","contentRating":"erotica","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"92d6d951-ca5e-429c-ac78-451071cbf064","name":{"en":"Office Workers"}}]}

e48840ea-f28b-44fe-9412-d95db2a1ac3c:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"e48840ea-f28b-44fe-9412-d95db2a1ac3c","title":{"en":"Legend of the Galactic Heroes (MICHIHARA Katsumi)"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Ginga Eiyuu Densetsu"},{"ru":"Легенда о героях Галактики"},{"ja":"銀河英雄伝説"},{"zh":"银河英雄传说"},{"tr":"Galaksi Kahramanları"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","ru"],"relatedIds":["26c1e1a6-3c8d-4513-af87-a2387eb69b90","a29bd145-116e-49c8-bc2f-b15857299304","bf57b016-6e71-42b2-bb00-a5950e8e574c"],"description":{"en":"Manga adaptation of 1980s.  \r\n  \r\nFive hundred years ago, Rudolf von Goldenbaum united the disparate governments of humankind and established a mighty human empire, a tribute to his own greatness that stretched across the galaxy. Demanding loyalty and discipline, Rudolf created an order designed to long outlast his own rule; but all human works fade in time. Today, the decaying empire faces the threat of the Free Planets Alliance, and military leaders on both sides jockey for power in the face of a seemingly inevitable conflict. On the side of the empire, the young general Reinhard von Lohengramm sees war as opportunity, and the empire as soft clay ready for his own sculpting. On the side of the alliance, would-be historian Yang Wen-li would like nothing better than to live out his days in peace - but times of war have little use for men who waste their days studying the mistakes of the past. Circumstances will make heroes and villains of both these men, as they write new history one blood-splattered page at a time.  \r\n  \r\n\r\n\r\n---","ru":"История человечества всегда была историей войн, во все времена, во все эпохи. One day, Chakuro visits an island as large as the Mud Whale and meets a girl who will change his destiny.  \n  \nNominated for the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2017.","pt-br":"Chakuro é um Registrador de 14 anos da Baleia de lama, uma ilha quase utópica que flutua na superfície de um infinito mar de areia. Chakuro e os seus amigos nunca viram ninguém do mundo exterior, e passam os seus dias ansiosos por explorar e aprender sobre isso. Um dia, Chakuro visita uma ilha tão grande como a Baleia de Lama, onde conhece uma menina que mudará seu destino.","vi":"Chakuro là một ký giả 14 tuổi của Cá Voi Bùn, một thuyền đảo trôi nổi trên biển cát vô tận. e4fe77ba-de0a-4562-8ecf-c21231ff491a:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"e4fe77ba-de0a-4562-8ecf-c21231ff491a","title":{"en":"Shana oh Yoshitsune"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Shanaou"},{"ja-ro":"Shanaou Yoshitsune"},{"th":"ชานาโอ ขุนศึกสะท้านปฐพี"},{"zh-hk":"俠義少年王"},{"ja":"遮那王義経"}],"lastChapter":"78","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"relatedIds":["9a018f59-b78f-44a6-b7a1-6253d20a5e30"],"description":{"en":"Hyouta is an orphaned boy who's in a group of traveling entertainers. One day he encounters a fine noble woman named Tokiwa who requests the group to perform at her home. But her intentions are not what they seem to be…  \n  \nShana oh Yoshitsune is an alternative story to the popular historical figure Minamoto no Yoshitsune along with his servants, including the renown Benkei who lived in the Heian Era. In this version, Yoshitsune is actually a weak, sickly boy who meets an exact body replica in Hyouta, a traveling orphan who earns his living on the street. Being physically stronger, Hyouta is led to become a replacement for Yoshitsune, eventually claiming the name as his own.  \n  \nThis manga is a fictional story (albeit with many historical references) of his journey to restore the honor of Genji (Minamoto) Clan."},"links":{"al":"34031","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B075722FTF","ap":"shana-ou-yoshitsune","kt":"8876","mal":"4031","mu":"963"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}}]}

Whether it be rival assassin groups, Homicidal coworkers, or his own violent urges, no obstacle is too great when it comes to Sandy's ambition."},"links":{"engtl":"https://namicomi.com/en/title/iiwaTFvS/corporate-killing?utm_source=md"},"originalLanguage":"en","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"891cf039-b895-47f0-9229-bef4c96eccd4","name":{"en":"Self-Published"}},{"id":"b1e97889-25b4-4258-b28b-cd7f4d28ea9b","name":{"en":"Philosophical"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

Absolutely not!”\n\nHowever, her opponent is a powerful duke, so she turns to Terrence, the villain of the original story to be her assistant for a smooth divorce.\n\n“The only person I want to have by my side is you, Ethel.”\n\n…But this man’s fate is to be hurt by Liena.\n\nAs the more she knew about Terrence, the more he seemed attractive to her?"},"links":{"al":"170837","ap":"i-will-divorce-the-female-leads-siscon-brother","mal":"168724","mu":"h3vig9u","nu":"i-will-divorce-the-female-leads-siscon-brother","raw":"https://page.kakao.com/content/62812341"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"ace04997-f6bd-436e-b261-779182193d3d","name":{"en":"Isekai"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

e6e470bb-88b8-49e5-b236-c72aa5550e18:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"e6e470bb-88b8-49e5-b236-c72aa5550e18","title":{"en":"The 30 Day Engagement"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"30일의 약혼녀"},{"en":"30 Day Fiancée"},{"en":"Fiancée for 30 Days"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"Do I want to live? Of course I do!\n\nJust before she gets hit by a huge truck, Inseo Han, an ordinary South Korean woman who worked in a research lab, receives a text message offering her a special journey, new relationships, and opportunities for extra income. Determined to make it out of the situation alive, she accepts the offer and soon finds herself in the Raotwan Empire of Laseania as Duke Adrian's 12th fiancee candidate, Isella Derhen. Inseo has to act the role for an entire month in order to make it back to earth alive, but this job requires her to deceive not only a few nobles but the entire empire as well as the emperor. Not only that, but Duke Adrian demands that Inseo must never fall in love with him.\n\nMeanwhile, Adrian, the duke and patriach of House Beleskez, is in search of an adequate fiancee to avoid a royal marriage with the emperor's third daughter, Princess Kiersten. Though things would be very simple if the princess were to marry the duke's son, Lord Aslan, political strife complicates the situation and Adrian cannot simply turn down the marriage. Hence, he seeks someone who can act as his fiancee so he would have a justified reason to avoid the royal marriage until Aslan succeeds the dukedom.\n\nWill Inseo win the deal and the opportunity to save her life? Can she and Adrian pull off the tremendous act without getting caught?\n\n---\n\n- [Original Webtoon \u003cPeanutoon\u003e](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/6767)\n- [Original Webtoon Oku","ja":"漫画誌ハルタから、増刊『テラン』が誕生します。ハルタは年2回(1月・7月)におやすみがありますが、その月にも漫画を届けたい！　という思いから企画しました。全作品、すべて新作、すべて読切。\n\nインドネシア語で「光」という名を冠する『テラン』。\nそして巻頭・巻中カラーなど色で楽しませる仕掛けも盛りだくさん。\n\nきらめく読切作品を集めた宝箱のような増刊『テラン』、どうぞよろしくね！\n\n---\n**2021 SUMMER 巻の内容：**\nカバーイラスト：あき\n1. 「修理屋さんの朝」漫画家：もりょ\n2. 「ファンタズム」漫画家：三ッ葉稔\n3. 「日向インパクト」漫画家：大島琳太郎\n4. 「全裸の夢と叶えるライン」漫画家：樫木祐人\n5. 「夜鷹心中」漫画家：飴石\n6. 「知らず知らずの姉妹」漫画家：野澤佑季恵\n7. 「ふたりのチカラ」漫画家：イヌヅカヒロ\n8. e6fd3f78-bd26-4876-a042-10bb155e9004:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"e6fd3f78-bd26-4876-a042-10bb155e9004","title":{"en":"The Color of Earth"},"altTitles":[{"en":"The Color of Heaven"},{"en":"The Color of Water"},{"en":"The Color Trilogy"},{"en":"황토빛이야기"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["pl"],"description":{"en":"In the tradition of \"My Antonia\" and \"A Tree Grows in Brooklyn\", from the pen of the renowned Korean manwha creator Kim Dong Hwa, comes a trilogy about a girl coming of age, set in the vibrant, beautiful landscape of pastoral Korea.  \n  \n1. \"The Color of Earth\": First love is never easy. Ehwa grows up helping her widowed mother run the local tavern, watching as their customers – both neighbors and strangers – look down on her mother for her single lifestyle. Their social status isolates Ehwa and her mother from the rest of the people in their quiet country village. But as she gets older and sees her mother fall in love again, Ehwa slowly begins to open up to the possibility of love in her life.  \n  \n2. \"The Color of Water\": When Ehwa goes to the town festival, she meets a handsome young wrestler named Duksam who’s eager to catch her eye. After he wins the festival wrestling championship, he and Ehwa begin to meet, sneaking spare moments to be together. But a shadow falls on their romance when Master Cho sends Duksam away and asks for Ehwa’s hand in marriage himself It is then that Ehwa discovers the pain of heartbreak – and that love is always complicated.  \n  \n3. \"The Color of Heaven\": A celebration of the triumph of true love. As Ehwa grew from a girl to a young woman in The Color of Earth and The Color of Water, she began to understand and experience love and relationships, with her mother as a model and confidante. Now, in the heartwarming conclusion to this lyrically written and delicately drawn trilogy, Ehwa's true love comes at last, and as her mother looks on, she takes the final steps towards becoming an adult."},"links":{"al":"108563","ap":"the-color-of-earth","kt":"2605","mal":"16272","mu":"41484"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}
